text: Futhi (khumbula) ngenkathi u-Abrahamu ethi, “Nkosi yami ngikhombise ukuthi ubaphilisa kanjani abafileyo” uMvelinqangi wathi, “Awukakholwa yini na?” (u-Abrahamu) wathi “Yebo, kodwa ukuze inhliziyo yami yaneliseke” Wathi uMvelinqangi, “ngakho-ke thatha izinyoni ezine (uzifundise ukuba zilalele wena) uzihlinze bese ubeka izingcezu zazo phezulu kwentaba nentaba bese uzibiza ziyoza kuwena zishesha futhi yazi ukuthi uMvelinqangi uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
